TextView.android:text: 📊 Weekly Mental Health and Well-Being Survey
This survey will help us understand your well-being over the past week. Your responses are confidential and contribute to our research on the relationship between phone activity and mental health.
🧠 Mood & Emotions
Over the last 7 days, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?\n(0 = Not at all, 1 = Several days, 2 = More than half the days, 3 = Nearly every day)
Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Poor appetite or overeating
Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure
Trouble concentrating on things
Moving or speaking so slowly that others noticed, or being restless
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or hurting yourself
😴 Sleep Patterns
Answer based on your sleep over the past 7 days:
On average, what time did you go to bed?
On average, how many hours did you sleep per night?
8 hours
How often did you have trouble falling asleep?\n(0 = Not during the week, 1 = 1–2 times/week, 2 = 3+ times/week)
How would you rate your overall sleep quality?\n(1 = Very good, 2 = Fairly good, 3 = Fairly bad, 4 = Very bad)
👥 Social Connection
Indicate how often you felt the following this week:\n(1 = Never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often)
I felt isolated from others
I felt in tune with people around me
I lacked companionship
I had meaningful conversations with someone
⚠️ Stress & Coping
Please answer the following questions about your week:\n(0 = Never, 1 = Almost never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Fairly often, 4 = Very often)
How often did you feel nervous or stressed?
How often did you feel confident in handling personal problems?
How often did you feel overwhelmed by your responsibilities?
What coping strategies did you use this week? (Select all that apply)
📈 Productivity & Focus
How would you rate your ability to focus this week? (1–5)
Were you able to complete most of your planned tasks?
How satisfied were you with your productivity? (1 = Not at all, 5 = Extremely)
🏃 Physical Health & Energy
Did you engage in physical exercise this week?
If yes, how many days? (0–7)
How would you rate your energy levels this week? (1–5)
Did you experience any of the following this week? (Select all that apply)
